scripts.prepare:local: mustache networks/local.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.local.yaml && mustache networks/local.json src/constants.template.ts src/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: mustache networks/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.rinkeby.yaml && mustache networks/rinkeby.json src/constants.template.ts src/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache networks/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.mainnet.yaml && mustache networks/mainnet.json src/constants.template.ts src/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 pooltogether/loot-box-subgraph subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/lootbox-v1_0_0 subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet-stg: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/lootbox-staging-v1_0_0 subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/rinkeby-lootbox subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby-stg: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/ptv3-lootbox-rinkeby-staging subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.mainnet-all: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet
